title: Literacy rate in South Africa 2015
summary: Overall Adult total, Adult male, and Adult female are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Share of population ages 15 and above, in descending order is: 1. Adult male, 2. Adult total, and lastly, 3. Adult female.
The minimum Share of population ages 15 and above about 87.04, occured at 2007 by Adult female.
yAxis: Share of population ages 15 and above
